price: Na katika khabari za Thamudi walipo ambiwa: Jifurahisheni kwa muda mdogo tu.
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: Na katika kisa cha Thamudi ipo Ishara. Walipo ambiwa: Stareheni katika majumba yenu kwa muda maalumu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
